amendment.description: Amendment sought to prohibit the FHA from raising the multifamily housing mortgage insurance premium to an amount greater than the cost of such program with offsets of $5 million from the HUD Operation Safe Home program.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to add a new section providing an offset of $5 million and disallowing use of funds for use to fix, establish, charge, or collect mortgage insurance premiums for mortgage insurance made available under the Housing Act in an amount greater than the cost of the insurance.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Frank amendment (A035) Failed by recorded vote: 212 - 212 (Roll no. 295).
